vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαλάκ, ὁ, indecl. (Heb. בָּלָק),
Balak; (Num.22:2): Rev.2:14.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Moabites living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.22.2;
son of: Zippor (H6834)
§ Balak, "devastator"
Balak, (Proper name), indeclinable, Rev. 2:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴勒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "毀壞者,掠奪者"
一名摩押王 (啟 2:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴勒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "毁坏者,掠夺者"
一名摩押王 (启 2:14)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-lác « sự tàn phá » Xem H1111.
